related.meaning: tempat lain, di suatu tempat lain, bagian-bagian yang aneh
terlalu banyak, tidak perlu, berlimpah, surplus, kelebihan, berlebihan
sangat, banyak, sampai batas tertentu, cukup

lessons.japanese: もし手に余るようなことがあれば、私に助けを求めなさい。
lessons.indonesian: If you have any difficulty, ask me for help.

lessons.japanese: それは身に余る光栄でございます。
lessons.indonesian: The honor is more than I deserve.

lessons.japanese: それは私の力に余る仕事です。
lessons.indonesian: It is a task beyond my power.

lessons.japanese: この仕事は私の力に余る。
この仕事は私の手に余る。
lessons.indonesian: This job is too much for me.

lessons.japanese: 弟の乱暴はこのごろ目に余る。
lessons.indonesian: My brother has been much too rowdy lately.
The honor you are giving me is more than I deserve.

lessons.japanese: 昨年は有り余る程の米が生産された。
lessons.indonesian: An abundance of rice was produced last year.
